source.120c6e99:
data = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/cardataset/data.csv')
data.columns = data.columns.str.lower().str.replace(' ', '_')

strings = list(data.dtypes[data.dtypes == 'object'].index)

for col in strings:
    data[col] = data[col].str.lower().str.replace(' ', '_')
